title: Please Take The 2018 SSC Reader Survey
summary:
Key ideas
- The author (Scott) encourages readers to take the 2018 SSC survey.
- The survey is divided into three sections, each taking approximately ten minutes.
- Readers can choose to take one or all three sections of the survey.

Key learnings
- The 2018 SSC survey is important to the author and likely important to readers who enjoy his posts.
- The survey is divided into three sections to accommodate varying levels of time availability.

Key questions
- None mentioned in this portion of the post.
